named-query.name: queryFieldVByWindow
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM ADFieldV f WHERE f.aDTabID=:windowID ORDER BY f.seqNo

named-query.name: queryWindowByID
named-query.query: SELECT w FROM ADWindow w WHERE w.aDTabID=:windowID

named-query.name: queryColumnByTable
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ADColumn c WHERE c.aDTableID=:tableID

named-query.name: queryLookupColumnsByTable
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ADColumn c WHERE c.aDTableID=:tableID AND c.identifier=true

named-query.name: lookupClient
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ADClient c WHERE c.name LIKE :filter

named-query.name: lookupOrg
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ADOrg c WHERE c.name LIKE :filter

named-query.name: lookupConsignor
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CBPartner c WHERE c.consignor=true AND (c.name LIKE :filter OR c.orgName LIKE :filter)

named-query.name: lookupConsignee
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CBPartner c WHERE c.consignee=true AND (c.name LIKE :filter OR c.orgName LIKE :filter)

named-query.name: lookupUser
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM ADUser u WHERE u.name LIKE :filter

named-query.name: lookupOrder
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM COrder c WHERE c.orderCd LIKE :filter
